body:
Hey guys, OPTOBAT here, and i was just rushing on Teres and got all 3 monuments (despite some heavy block lag) and i was just thinking; In the statistics page on your profile, i think there should be a column saying how many monuments you've broken in your 'career'.

Anyone else agree?

title: New Avicus Stats Idea.

replies.body: Since the 'Avicore' update the monuments that you break in Nebula are now counted. The objective section on your profile displays this information - not only for Nebula but all gamemodes. If you hover your cursor over the dots on the black line it will show you how many monuments you broke that month.
